list_definition.definition: to tell; to give knowledge to

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Please inform me of your intentions in this matter
I was informed that you were absent from the office.

list_definition.definition: (with againstor on) to tell facts to eg the police about (a criminal etc)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He informed against his fellow thieves.
